exchangedDocumentContext.title: BSP Master. Exchanged Document_ Context
exchangedDocumentContext.description: The set of context parameters specified for a use of this master message assembly.

exchangedDocument.title: BSP Master. Exchanged_ Document
exchangedDocument.description: The header document information for a use of this master message assembly.

exchangedDeclaration.title: BSP Master. Exchanged_ Declaration. Exchanged_ Declaration
exchangedDeclaration.description: A collection of data that is exchanged related to a regulatory declaration for a use of this master message.

specifiedLogisticsTransportMovement.title: BSP Master. Specified. Logistics_ Transport Movement
specifiedLogisticsTransportMovement.description: The logistics transport movement specified for a use of this master message assembly.

specifiedConsignment.title: BSP Master. Specified. Supply Chain_ Consignment
specifiedConsignment.description: A supply chain consignment specified for a use of this master message assembly.

specifiedLogisticsTransportEquipment.title: BSP Master. Specified. Logistics_ Transport Equipment
specifiedLogisticsTransportEquipment.description: A piece of logistics transport equipment specified for a use of this master message assembly.

specifiedService.title: BSP Master. Specified. Transport_ Service
specifiedService.description: A transport service specified for a use of this master message assembly.

tradeSettlementPayment.title: BSP Master. Trade Settlement_ Payment
tradeSettlementPayment.description: A trade settlement payment for a use of this master message assembly.

tradeTransaction.title: BSP Master. Supply Chain_ Trade Transaction
tradeTransaction.description: A supply chain trade transaction specified for a use of this master message assembly.

tradeProduct.title: BSP Master. Trade_ Product. Trade_ Product

animalBatch.title: BSP Master. Animal_ Batch. Animal_ Batch

productionFacility.title: BSP Master. Production_ Facility. Production_ Facility

headerTradeDelivery.title: BSP Master. Header_ Trade Delivery. Header_ Trade Delivery

lineTradeDelivery.title: BSP Master. Line_ Trade Delivery. Line_ Trade Delivery

valuationBreakdownStatement.title: BSP Master. Valuation_ Breakdown Statement
valuationBreakdownStatement.description: A detailed statement of work, prices, and dimensions for a use of this mastermessage assembly.
